translations: n.涂封物；密封材料（sealer 复数）

phrs.translation: 涂封物, 封闭玻璃管, 封底层, 嘘嘘乐
食品真空密封, 食品真空封口机, 真空食品封口机

sentences.sentence: This year, sealers will beat and skin up to 338,200 of these gentle animals.
sentences.translation: 今年，海豹捕杀者将会打死并剥掉338200只这种可爱温顺的动物的皮。

sentences.sentence: The sealers add that it helps to preserve diminished fish stocks (though scientists dispute that).
sentences.translation: 海豹猎人补充说道：那将有利于帮助阻止鱼类资源的减少(虽然科学家否认这一点)。

sentences.sentence: Machinisms of controlling surface defects produced in drawing Stainless steel Beer Keg Sealers are studed.
sentences.translation: 这篇文章研究不锈钢扎啤桶封头表面拉深缺陷的产生以及节制机理。
